name: Green Goddess Gouda Vegan Cheese
description: Green Goddess Gouda Vegan Cheese and Grilled Cheese Sandwich! smoky smooth herbed gouda! Dairy-free soy-free recipe
recipeIngredient: 3/4 cup coconut milk ( or almond milk)
1/2 cup great northern beans (canned or cooked, drained or other white beans)
1/4 cup lightly packed green onion ( or 1-2 tsp onion flakes)
1 tsp liquid smoke (for a smokier taste. personally I prefer without as the liquid smoke over shadows the other flavors)

itemListElement.text: Blend everything (coconut milk through olive oil) into a smooth puree. Taste and adjust tang, salt, spice.
itemListElement.name: Blend everything (coconut milk through olive oil) into a smooth puree. Taste and adjust tang, salt, spice.

itemListElement.text: Add the starches and liquid smoke, if using, and blend.
itemListElement.name: Add the starches and liquid smoke, if using, and blend.

itemListElement.text: In a pan, add 1/2 cup coconut or almond milk. Whisk in the agar powder and bring to a boil. Cook on low-medium heat for 5 minutes.
itemListElement.name: In a pan, add 1/2 cup coconut or almond milk. Whisk in the agar powder and bring to a boil. Cook on low-medium heat for 5 minutes.

itemListElement.text: Pour the blended mix into the pan. Mix well and continue to cook for 5-6 minutes.
itemListElement.name: Pour the blended mix into the pan. Mix well and continue to cook for 5-6 minutes.

itemListElement.text: Transfer the mix to a greased container or mold and let sit for a few hours in the refrigerator. (I used 2 tsp of evoo to grease the container. Also brush some on the top of the block so it doesn't dry out)
itemListElement.name: Transfer the mix to a greased container or mold and let sit for a few hours in the refrigerator. (I used 2 tsp of evoo to grease the container. Also brush some on the top of the block so it doesn't dry out)

itemListElement.text: Slice and use. Keep refrigerated for upto 5 days.
itemListElement.name: Slice and use. Keep refrigerated for upto 5 days.
